description: MongoDB Prometheus Exporter Dashboard. A fork inspired from https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/2583 which is made to work well with https://github.com/percona/mongodb_exporter.

panels.description: See which node is currently acting as the primary, secondary, ...
panels.title: Member State

panels.description: This shows the time since the last election.
panels.title: ReplSet Last Election

panels.description: This metric can show a correlation with the replication lag value.
panels.title: Max Member Ping Time - $instance

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", image!=""}) by (container)

ceil(sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|md.+|dasd.+)", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|md.+|dasd.+)", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|md.+|dasd.+)", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: MongoDB replication lag occurs when the secondary node cannot replicate data fast enough to keep up with the rate that data is being written to the primary node. It could be caused by something as simple as network latency, packet loss within your network, or a routing issue.
panels.title: Replication Lag

panels.description: Sum of the space allocated to all collections in the database for document storage, including free space.
panels.title: Allocated Storage to Collections in DB

panels.description: Number of objects (documents) in the database across all collections
panels.title: Number of Objects in DB

panels.description: Average Object Size in the DB
panels.title: Average Object Size in DB

panels.description: Sum of the space allocated to all indexes in the database, including free index space.
panels.title: Allocated Storage to Indexs in DB

panels.description: Number of collections in the database.
panels.title: Total Collections/DB

panels.description: Total number of indexes across all collections in the database.
panels.title: Total Indexs/DB

panels.description: Number of views in the database.
panels.title: Total Views/DB

panels.description: Number of collections in the database.
panels.title: Total Collections/DB

panels.description: Total number of indexes across all collections in the database.
panels.title: Total Indexs/DB

panels.description: Number of views in the database.
panels.title: Total Views/DB

title: Services / MongoDB
